$BNB  ‚Äì Support Retest, Eyeing $928 Breakout  Binance Coin is trading at $862 USDT, consolidating above a demand zone between $820‚Äì$835 USDT. The chart highlights a potential retest of this support before continuation higher, with projection suggesting upside toward the $928 USDT resistance.  Momentum remains constructive ‚Äî the rising structure and repeated defense of support confirm buyers are in control. A clean breakout above $880‚Äì$890 would strengthen the bullish case, while failure to hold $820 could drag price back toward $800.  üìå Key Levels:  Current price: $862  Support zone: $820‚Äì$835  Resistance target: $928  Broader structure: support retest ‚Üí breakout ‚Üí continuation  This is a buy-the-dip setup ‚Äî $BNB  is coiling above support, and buyers are preparing for the next leg higher. Traders should watch for confirmation candles before committing.  #BNBChain#  #Altcoin Season#  #BNB  #Altcoin Season#  #Bullish

Buyers are consistently defending the rising trendline, showing strong demand absorption on pullbacks while $BNB  coils tightly below resistance.  A clean breakout and close above the horizontal supply should trigger upside continuation for $BNB , with momentum expansion toward $900+ levels next. As long as $BNB  holds the ascending trendline, the structure remains bullish and favors a breakout rather than rejection. $BNB  New Year will bring Big Bull

The crypto market is facing visible pressure as Bitcoin and several major altcoins struggle near key resistance levels. Price action shows that sellers are still active at higher levels, preventing a clean breakout and keeping short-term momentum in check.
Alongside Bitcoin, assets like Ethereum,  $BNB,  $XRP, Solana, Dogecoin, Cardano, and Bitcoin Cash are showing similar weakness. This clustering around resistance suggests hesitation from buyers and a cautious market tone as we approach the new year.
How these assets react at these levels will be important. A rejection could lead to deeper consolidation, while a decisive breakout may shift sentiment heading into 2026 and redefine the market‚Äôs next direction.

$BNB  ‚Äî Reversal Structure Loading   $BNB  is showing clear signs of recovery after defending a major demand zone, with price now forming higher lows on the 4H timeframe. The recent sell-off into the highlighted support was aggressively bought, confirming strong buy-side interest at discounted levels. Market structure is shifting as BNB reclaims key intraday levels and pushes back into the range equilibrium.    This setup suggests a classic accumulation-to-expansion phase, where liquidity has already been collected below the lows. If price holds above the reclaimed mid-range and breaks local resistance, continuation toward the marked upside target becomes highly probable.    However, failure to sustain above current levels could trigger a deeper pullback toward the demand zone for another liquidity sweep. Bias remains cautiously bullish while structure holds.    #BNB  #BNBChain#  #Altcoin Season#  $BNB

$BNB is consolidating above $850, latest close near $861. Support holds at $857‚Äì$860, while $869‚Äì$870 caps upside. Volume reflects active ecosystem participation rather than broader macro moves.

2025 was a landmark year for BNB Chain.

The network reached new highs in activity, liquidity and transactions, all with zero downtime.

Here‚Äôs what a year of growth looks like üëáüßµ 
This year marks the 5th anniversary of BNB Chain, uniting builders and long-time supporters to celebrate this milestone.

As a global ecosystem, BNB Chain's mission remains steadfast: To help builders onboard the next billion people into Web3. 
In 2025, network usage grew consistently:

üî∏ 700M+ unique addresses
üî∏ 4M daily active users across BSC and opBNB
üî∏ TVL up 40.5%
üî∏ Avg daily transactions at 10.78M, peaking at 31M

Network demand fueled by activity across liquid staking, stablecoins, RWAs and yield-focused applications.
Even during periods of high demand, the network held up and operated with 100% uptime.

At peak, the network processed up to 5 trillion gas per day while confirming transactions without interruption. https://twitter.com/1052454006537314306/status/1976233721670901894
Infrastructure upgrades did the heavy lifting.

The Lorentz, Pascal, and Maxwell hardforks improved capacity and efficiency, cutting block times to as low as 0.75 seconds. 
@MessariCrypto Security stayed foundational.

The Goodwill Alliance reduced sandwich attacks by 95%, making BSC a more reliable environment for users and builders üëá
https://www.bnbchain.org/en/blog/how-the-goodwill-alliance-slashed-sandwich-attacks-by-95
Real usage stood out across the BNB Chain ecosystem:

üî∏ Stablecoin market cap doubled to $14B.
üî∏ RWA adoption passed $1.8B in total value.

These weren‚Äôt experiments. They were active and growing use cases in the ecosystem. 
@Dune Builders remained the engine of progress.

Support programs like BNB Hack, MVB, Demo Days & Nights backed the teams shipping real products and driving sustainable growth. 
BNB Chain demonstrated its ability to operate reliably at scale, setting a new baseline for the future.

The focus is on pushing for even faster performance, lower costs, fairer execution and better tooling, guided by real-world usage and the tech roadmap.

Read the full 2025 report üëá
https://t.co/IOOiZrBWcv
